column5: We are located in Alvin Texas, about 30 miles southeast from the NRG Stadium in Houston where Superbowl 2017 will be held. We are also about 20 minutes south of Houston Hobby Airport. We live in a quiet neighborhood on 1.3 acres. It has a nice private backyard for group gatherings. Walmart and other stores within 5 min from the house.
column8: Large Private House in the country
